== Introduction ==
'''Ubuntu LoCo Hong Kong Team''' is a group of volunteers come together to share, enjoy, advocate and promote the usage of '''Ubuntu Linux''' in Hong Kong. The team will help to raise a local community and help others resolving difficulties when using '''Ubuntu Linux'''.

== How to Contribute ==
You can do any activity of,

# Use any edition of '''Ubuntu (Kubuntu, Xubuntu, Edubuntu, etc...) Linux'''
# Ask questions on forum/IRC
# Answer questions on forum/IRC
# Report problems on forum/launchpad/IRC
# Provide(or redirect) a solution (you known) to the reported problems on forum/launchpad/IRC
# Attend '''Ubuntu LoCo Hong Kong Team''' events
# Blog about '''Ubuntu LoCo Hong Kong Team'''

== Forum ==
'''Ubuntu LoCo Hong Kong Team''' does not have its own forum at this moment. However, a local forum would be set up until the community is getting big enough. <<BR>>
In the mean time, you can post your questions/problems on:

# <nowiki>[[http://hk.ubuntuforums.org/|香港 Ubuntu 討論區]]</nowiki>
# <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-tw.org/modules/newbb/|台灣 Ubuntu 正體中文站 討論區]]</nowiki>
# <nowiki>[[http://forum.ubuntu.org.cn/|中国 Ubuntu 中文论坛]]</nowiki>

== Contact ==
Anyone want to join and contribute can contact me at <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/abgalphabet|abgalphabet]]</nowiki>
